item.title: Little dents
item.description: Deciding to fix a big dent in a car isn’t perplexing. It’s an easy choice. There’s a huge dent, get it fixed. It’s the little dents that are a dilemma...

item.title: Decision-Making Frameworks For Reducing Operational Debt

item.title: Not Many Employers Cover GLP-1 Weight Loss Drugs
item.description: Fewer than 20% of large employers are covering GLP-1 weight loss drugs like Ozempic, a new KFF analysis shows.
